actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To provide that certain regulations proposed by the Comptroller of the Currency, the Director of the Office of Thrift Supervision, the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation relating to "Know Your Customer" practices of financial institutions shall not take effect.
short_title: Know Your Customer Regulations Termination Act

summary.text: Know Your Customer Regulations Termination Act - Prohibits certain proposed "know your customer" regulations published in the Federal Register on December 7, 1998, by the Comptroller of the Currency, the Director of the Office of Thrift Supervision, the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation from being published in final form. Terminates any such regulation that has become effective before enactment of this Act. Prohibits such agencies from prescribing any similar regulation.

titles.title: Know Your Customer Regulations Termination Act

To provide that certain regulations proposed by the Comptroller of the Currency, the Director of the Office of Thrift Supervision, the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation relating to "Know Your Customer" practices of financial institutions shall not take effect.
